item.description:
We are deeply saddened to inform you that Eastern Mass REIA's Director of Operations, John Ingram's Father, Henry S. Ingram, passed away on October 19th. A celebration of his life is planned for Friday, November 6th at the Plymouth County Club from 4-6pm located at 221 Warren Ave Plymouth MA.


Upcoming Meetings and Events!!!


November 14th and 15th...

Don't wait as this event is limited to 84 seats meaning we only have 9 open seats available. This weekend is also your last weekend to reserve your room at our discounted price!Learn More

www.NorthEastWealthExpo.com
Two Days of Content and Networking and we are going to feed you (yes, meals) a couple of times…….. How refreshing!!!! And special room rates too!!!! Learn More


During these 2 days you will learn: Entity structures, which to use and which to avoid….Tax savings, found money….Asset Protection…. ….Wholesaling REO's….Commercial Foreclosures, the next wave….Negotiating with the banks, brokers, owners and other investors….Rehabbing and Contractors….Marketing….Financing conventional, private (friendly money), hard money….RV and Mobile Home Parks….Government Programs and Grants. Learn More

ALL THIS FOR ONLY $99.00 Click Here to Register!!

Here is your chance to Earn Many PHP Credits for 1 Weekend of education!!!




Join Us Next Month Thursday November 12th Pre-REgister Today


Catch the Next wave!
November's Montlhy meeting we will discuss:
The Financial Crisis and how we got here
How Bad is it likely to be?
The New Tax Credit Extension
TARP and other Government Relief Programs
New Influx of REO's
Inventory Begins to build
What does all of this mean for you as the investor???
Cha-Ching!!!!

Don't miss Eastern Mass REIA's Next Monthly Meeting Thursday November 12th...

Pre- Register Today


Thank you,

John Ingram and John Fossetti
www.easternmassreia.com
www.facebook.com/easternmassreia
www.twitter.com/easternmassreia

item.name: Catch the Next wave!
